languages.text: [Достать оружие] "Возьми себя в руки или пожалеешь".
[Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."
languages.original_text: [Достать оружие] "Возьми себя в руки или пожалеешь".

traits.locale_text: [Produce a weapon] "Pull yourself together or you will regret it."
[Produce a weapon] "Pull yourself together or you will regret it."
[Brandish a weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."
[Brandish a weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."
[Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."
[Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

languages.text: [抽出武器]“你最好打起精神，否则你一定会后悔。”
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

traits.locale_text: [抽出武器]“你最好打起精神，否则你一定会后悔。”

languages.text: [武器を構える]「しっかりしろ、さもなくば後悔することになる」
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

traits.locale_text: [武器を構える]「しっかりしろ、さもなくば後悔することになる」

languages.text: [Dégainer votre arme] « Parlez-moi sur un autre ton, ou vous le regretterez amèrement. »
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

traits.locale_text: [Dégainer votre arme] « Parlez-moi sur un autre ton, ou vous le regretterez amèrement. »

languages.text: [Silahını çek] "Kendine gel. Pişman olacağın bir şey yapma."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

traits.locale_text: [Silahını çek] "Kendine gel. Pişman olacağın bir şey yapma."

languages.text: [Deine Waffe ziehen] "Reißt Euch zusammen, oder Ihr werdet es bereuen."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "Pull yourself together, or you will regret it."

traits.locale_text: [Deine Waffe ziehen] "Reißt Euch zusammen, oder Ihr werdet es bereuen."
